onboarding.lunchQuestion: What would be your typical lunch?
onboarding.lunchDescription: At your age, foods have a significant role on your body's ability to burn fat.

testimonials.fascinatingText: My customized fasting plan really helped me with my stomach cramps and bloating problems.
testimonials.awesomeText: My customized fasting plan really helped me...

texts.testimonial-1: My customized fasting plan really helped me with my stomach cramps and bloating problems.
texts.testimonial-2: I feel so much more energetic throughout the day. The plan is easy to follow and very effective.
texts.testimonial-3: The personalized approach made all the difference. I've never felt better about my body.
texts.testimonial-4: This app changed my relationship with food completely. The results speak for themselves.
